name: ui-overlay
readme: #ui-overlay The overlay wraps and coats nested content. Use this to provide tools and actions that appear on top of other. Handy for filter effects and icons. The idea is you have a `overlay` of html which sits over the rest of the contents. ```html your overlay here your content here ``` And, you can make the overlay automatically fade in and out on hover. ```html your overlay here your content here ``` To make it easy to center icon fonts, the overlay will set the font size and line height to completely span the overlay. So, a single [FontAwesome](http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/) icon can center and cover. ##Events ###click Click is captured and refired with `detail` so that you can easily bind and object to this overlay and have it handy when event processing. ##Attributes and Change Handlers ###detail Additional data to make available. This is a general data binding target so that you can inspect `evt.target.detail`. ###hover Set this flag attribute if you want the overlay to show and hide on hover. ##Methods ##Event Handlers Trap and re-fire clicks with the detail. ##Polymer Lifecycle This overlay automatically resizes to cover the wrapped element.
